thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Benny Grindstaff
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Benny Grindstaff

author: Benny Grindstaff
title: Benny Grindstaff
text: I received my pelican puv-7 system and the box was damaged. After installation I found the glass tube broken. I called customer service and they were excellent. They shipped replacement part the same day. From Florida to Tennessee in 2 days.
